vsParam:
Oh. I see.
So it means...

I've come to another world!
Am I right?

You're right...
Why do you look so happy?

Of course I'm happy!
It looks fun!

The so-called another world,
holds many uncertainties!

So it means that
my life will no longer be boring!
Wonderful! Yeah. A beautiful and bright life awaits!
Ah. Hmm... This is a pretty rare reaction...

Phew... Ah. Allow me to formally introduce myself.
Please help one another in a fairly long time yet to come!

I come from Kurken Island...
And I'm an... alchemist! Just call me Ryza!
Alright. Got it, Ryza~ Nice to meet you!
Yeah. Nice to meet you too! So... Is this place a school?

Yeah. It teaches magic and swordsmanship,
and pretty much everything. And of course, alchemy.
Yeah. Unfortunately, you can't go back to your world immediately.
You can study here before going back...
Yeah. Got it! Thank you very much!

Ha ha ha. I don't think I have another option.
And, it's nice to have an opportunity to study alchemy here.

So I happily agreed! Hmm. [px]!
Please show me interesting places in the Academy!
Yeah! Thank you! Let's go now!
Hey, here! Wait! Don't leave me behind. I'm here!!
Ha ha ha. She looks like a vibrant kid...
Yeah. The Academy is getting more lively. Heehee.
